name: sugar plum cowl
notes:
this free pattern is available exclusively at [leahmichelledesigns.com][1].

choose a tonal or variegated yarn and let the colour shine in this easy stockinette cowl with ribbed edges. it uses only one skein, or about 200 yards (183 m), of worsted weight yarn and is worked in the round. only knit and purl stitches are used. a great beginner project or an easy evening of tv knitting!

it is shown here in madelintosh tosh vintage. the colour is sugar plum.

find these other free patterns at leahmichelledesigns.com:
[dappled shawl][2]
[blended shawl][3]
[truly triangular scarf][4]
[totally triangular scarf][5]
[jagged triangular scarf][6]
[effortless slouch hat][7]
[bulky ribbed cowl][8]

join the [leah michelle designs ravelry group][9] for pattern support, announcements, promos, and kals.

subscribe to the [leah michelle designs newsletter][10] for pattern announcements and subscriber-only discounts.
